pkgmetadata.longdescription: Opinionated Approach for Digitizing Semi-Structured Qualitative GIS Data // Provides a set of functions for taking qualitative GIS data, hand drawn on a map, and converting it to a simple features object. These tools are focused on data that are drawn on a map that contains some type of polygon features. For each area identified on the map, the id numbers of these polygons can be entered as vectors and transformed using qualmap.
